summary: Tested AuraTooltip coverage across 11 pages (Sprint 4 Gap Fill). All tooltips working correctly with glassmorphic design, hover functionality, and amber-colored ? icons.
passed_tests: CalendarPage: Release Date label tooltip in detail sheet
DeliverablesPage: 4 tooltips (page title, Type, Status, Release columns)
BlogPage: 11 tooltips (page title, blog titles, excerpts on cards)
AnalyticsPage: 5 tooltips (page header description, KPI cards)

All tooltips show glassmorphic design with backdrop-blur-md
All tooltips appear on hover correctly
All tooltip icons are amber-400 colored HelpCircle (? icon)
critical_code_review_comments: AuraTooltip component correctly uses createPortal for overlay rendering
Tooltip content properly centralized in tooltipContent.js (115+ entries)
All 11 pages have tooltips implemented as per Sprint 4 requirements
